mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, shelterName, title, writer, viewCount, regdate FROM reserve ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve (num, title, writer, shelterName, reservedDate, reservedTime, name, phoneNumber, regDate) VALUES(reserve_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{shelterName}, #{reservedDate}, #{reservedTime}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT num, shelterName, title, writer, viewCount, regdate, reservedDate, reservedTime, name, phoneNumber, content FROM reserve WHERE num = #{num}
